settings.announcement_text: Free US shipping every day on all orders

settings.title: NEWSLETTER
settings.mailing_subheading: Sign up to become an AKL insider and receive 15% off your first order.

settings.heading: Jewelry designed to be worn on all of your life's adventures.

settings.title: Welcome
settings.text: Amanda K Lockrow is a jewelry collection that is handcrafted in small batches in Los Angeles, CA. We hope that our jewelry will last you for years to come and be a treasured piece in your collection. We believe in giving back and a portion of all sales are always donated to our favorite charities throughout the year.

settings.heading: Learn more about Amanda, her inspiration, process and brand values

settings.footer_signup_text: Be the first to hear about new products, specials, and Amanda's inspiration sent directly to your inbox. Plus AKL insiders receive 15% off your next order.
